text:
RELIGION

Selva Vinayagar Temple: Discourse on ‘Aazhwargal Arulamudam’ by Shanmuga Thirukumaran, Railway Colony, 6.30 p.m.

Thiruvalluvar Mandram: Discourse on ‘Avvai Kural’ by A.K.S. Thirumavalavan, S.S. Colony, 5 p.m.

Ramakrishna Mutt: Aarathi, Reserve Line, New Natham Road, 6.30 p.m.

Panniru Thirumurai Mandram: Abirami Anthathi Parayanam, mutrothal, Adi Street, Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple, 6 p.m.

Sri Swami Tatwananda Ashram: Upanishad class by Swami Samanandar, South Veli Street, 6.45 p.m.

Lourdes Shrine: 96{+t}{+h}anniversary celebrations, Holy flag hoisting, Rev. Peter Fernando former archbishop, presides, K. Pudur, 6 p.m.

CULTURE

Sri Sathguru Sangeetha Samajam: 169{+t}{+h}Sri Thyagaraja Aradana Utsavam, young artistes’ concert, Lakshmi Sundaram Hall, 5.30 p.m.

Gandhi Memorial Museum: K.P. Gangadharan, yoga coordinator, conducts yoga classes, 6 a.m., 10.30 a.m. and 5 p.m.

International Sivananda Yoga Vedanta Centre: Yoga and meditation classes, 444 KK Nagar East Ninth Street, 6 a.m., 6.30 p.m., 10 a.m. and 4 p.m. (for women)

Prajapita Brahma Kumaris Ishwariya Vishwa Vidyalaya: Free rajayoga meditation classes, 36 Meenakshi Nagar, P and T Nagar, 40 Sambandamoorthy Street, 47 B CMR Road and 357 Anna Nagar, 6.30 a.m. and 5.30 p.m.

Yoga Research Centre: Yoga training by S. Yoganand, Department of Philosophy, Madura College, 6.30 a.m.

GENERAL

District Administration: Awareness drive on plastic use, Collector K. Veeraraghav Rao inaugurates distribution of cloth bags to farmers, B.B. Kulam Uzhavar Sandhai, 8.30 a.m.

Press Information Bureau: Public Information Campaign, second day event, Samayamurthi, chairman, Tamil Nadu Skill Development Corporation, speaks, 11.30 a.m.; ICT-ACT CEO Sivakumar speaks on ‘Scope in IT sector for youths in tier-II and tier-III cities,’ Medical College auditorium, 2.30 p.m.

Madurai Kamaraj University: Training programme on ‘Climate change coverage in Indian print media’ by Radhika Mittal of TERI University, New Delhi, 10 a.m.; valediction and certificate presentation, Seminar Hall, Faculty Guest House, 3.45 p.m.

Ramya Neuro Hospital: Inauguration of neuro exhibition and neuro rehabilitation ward, Dr. R. Durairaj presides, K. Kuruviah, District Judge, chief guest, Dr. G. Sivaraman delivers lecture on health, IMA Hall, Panagal Road, 7 p.m.

Thiagarajar College: Lecture on ‘Adolescent health’ by B. Ashifa, Programme Officer, Family Planning Association of India, Madurai, M. Eyini, Principal, presides, Diamond Jubilee Hall, 9.30 a.m.

Sermathai Vasan College for Women: Health Hygienic Club conducts ‘Adolescents’ problems and solutions’ by Dr. Narumalar of Vijay Nursing Home, Conference Hall, 9.55 a.m.; Rotaract Club meeting, V. Bhanumathy, Branch Manager, City Union Bank, chief guest, Seminar Hall, 10 a.m.

Lakshmi Vidya Sangham: 52{+n}{+d}Annual Day celebrations, Dr. T. Badrinarayanan (alumnus of TVS Higher Secondary School) Head, Medical Services, Dr. Agarwal’s Eye Hospital, chief guest, Open Air auditorium, TVS Higher Secondary School, Lakshmipuram, 5.30 p.m.

Madurai District Tiny and Small Scale Industries Association: Interaction meeting on ‘Role of TIIC in funding MSMEs’ with P. Ilango, Regional Manager, TIIC, L. Murari, president, presides, Maditssia Hall, Ambedkar Salai, 6 p.m.

SATHYA: Jumbo discount fair, expo-cum-sale of home-needs and consumables, Tamukkum Grounds, 10 a.m.

Saraswathi Narayanan College: Rotaract Club meeting, Raja Govindasamy, chief guest, M. Kannan, Principal, presides, 9 a.m.

Sourashtra College: Lecture on Mahatma Gandhi, Mahadev Vidrohi, chairman, All India Sarva Seva Sangam, Wardha, and T.R.N. Prabhu, Managing Trustee, Sevagram Ashram, Wardha, speak, Library Hall, 11 a.m.

Mannar Thirumalai Naicker College: 37{+t}{+h}Readers’ Club meeting, S. Muthulakshmi, Principal, Gandhian Thought University, speaks, Moorthy Naidu Andal Ammal Hall, 11.50 a.m.

Rotary Club of Madurai West: G. Mathalai Rajan speaks on ‘Conceptual Maths,’ Jain Vidyalaya, Palam Station Road, 6.30 p.m.

Thiagarajar College: Lecture on ‘Mobile apps and applications of image processing’ by M. Ganaga Durga of Government Arts College, Sivaganga, and G. Sofia of Lady Doak College, Principal Dr. M. Eyini presides, Diamond Jubilee Hall, 3.15 p.m.

SBOA Matriculation Higher Secondary School: Seven-day NSS camp, third day events, sports competitions for school students, R. Dheenadayalan presides, 9 a.m.; talk on importance of first-aid by B. Jayanthi, Melakuyilkudi Community Centre, 3 p.m.

TOPKIDS: Counselling at All Woman Police Station, Tallakulam, 10.30 a.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meeting, Grace Kennett Hospital, Ellis Nagar, 7 p.m.

MELUR

Alcoholics Anonymous: R.C. School, Sivaganga Road, 6.30 p.m.
title: Madurai today for jan 29 Friday
